amendment.description: To clarify that certain hydrogen demonstration programs include the entire National Park System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1399 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1399 proposed by Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S9942-9943; text: CR S9942) To clarify that certain hydrogen demonstration programs include the entire National Park System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1399 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1399 proposed by Senator Domenici.
